full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI DAM GYI BSKYED RIM YONGS RDZOGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036A *, ,(CES PADMA YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I BSKYED PA'I RIM PA PADMA ZHING GI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI RDO RJE'I SLOB MA, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN SOGS NANG SLOB 'GA' ZHIG GIS, 'DI LTA BU ZHIG NGES PAR DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE SLOB DPON RNAMS LAS CHOS 'DI'I DBANG BZHI YONGS RDZOGS, BKA' SDOD KYI RIGS GTAD DANG, RTA BOD YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I LUNG MAN NGAG THOB CING, BSNYEN BSGRUB SOGS TSANG DU SONG ZHING, CHOS 'DI LA DAL BA MANG DU BYAS PA'I LHA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN NAM, 'DI NYID KYI DKYIL 'KHOR DU PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL GYI MING THOB PAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA SO NYID DANG, ,'DIS KYANG GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG PA'I BSTAN PA'I YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,'DI LTA BU'I SHIN TU ZAB CING GSANG BA'I CHOS 'DI, DBANG MA THOB CING SNOD MIN SOGS KYIS LONGS SPYOD NA, CHOS SKYONG BEG TZE LCAM SRING DANG BKA' SDOD GING LNGA GZA' DANG 'KHOR DANG BCAS PAS DRAG PO'I LAS KYIS TSAR GCOD CIG ,SA MA YA TIshtA, DGE ZHING BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BHA WANTU,, ,,)
